c74object.name: fl.lookupstring~
c74object.digest: Lookup a specified string from an internally stored list of strings.
c74object.description: The first number at the input is used to specify the string. The number of stored items can be set explicitly by parameter. Alternatively, it can be set implicitly by the parameters present at instantiation. Items may be dynamically updated by parameter.

entry.name: 3. /empty [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the behaviour when empty frames are received:
ignore - empty frames are ignored.
reset - empty frames create empty tags to reset parameters to defaults.
[0] - ignore [1] - reset
